sentences.sContent: Thousands of ex-army officers have found lucrative jobs in private security firms.
sentences.sCn: 成千上万的退役军官在私人保安公司找到了薪水丰厚的工作。

synos.tran: [金融]有利可图的，赚钱的；合算的

remMethod.val: lucr( = lucre， 钱财) + ative(…的) → 赚钱的

trans.tranCn: 有利可图的， 赚钱的
trans.tranOther: a job or activity that is lucrative lets you earn a lot of money
